list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a forecast of a person's future, typically including a delineation of character and circumstances, based on the relative positions of the stars and planets at the time of that person's birth.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he gave lectures on astrology and cast horoscopes in his spare time
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông đã giảng bài về chiêm tinh học và tử vi trong thời gian rảnh rỗi
